author: Byungjoo Song
comment: It's wonderful Tasker plug-in app with persnoal vibration patterns. Never missed alarm with TTW. Thank you!!

reply.author: CodeChimp
reply.content: Glad you like the update. Thanks for the review and suggesting the improvement.

author: Fay Pork
comment: Although there's been no update for a year, thanks developer for creating this useful app
title: Very useful and free

title: Simple but perfect.
